attributes.action: change bottles and jars from glass to plastic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a dog owner who lives in darlington and find it very anoying that there is a large amount of broken glass on footpaths and grass in my area . It is dangerous to pets when they are running around they can cut there paws or legs on it. And if a child falls over they could also cut them selfs on it . Also there are alot people on bikes who complaine that they have popped tyres from the glass . My idea was that if all glass bottles and jars were made from plastic then people would not be able to smash them .
